post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Job Number: 4914197

Title: Web developer (NOC: 2175)

Terms of Employment: Temporary, Full Time, Day

Salary: $20.00 to $30.00 Hourly for 40 hours per week

Anticipated Start Date: 2010/03/26

Location: Toronto, Ontario (1 vacancy)

Skill Requirements:

Education: Some high school, Some college/CEGEP/vocational or technical training, Some university, Not applicable

Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Not required

Experience: 1 year to less than 2 years

Languages: Speak English, Read English, Write English

Work Setting: Research and development institution , Computer systems unit

Specific Skills: Consult with clients to develop and document web site requirements

Programming Languages: HTML, XML, CSS, Object-Oriented programming languages, PHP

Computer and Technology Knowledge: Windows, Database software, Programming languages

Applications: Adobe Photoshop

Work Conditions and Physical Capabilities: Tight deadlines, Attention to detail

Transportation/Travel Information: Own transportation, Public transportation is available

Essential Skills: Problem solving, Job task planning and organizing, Computer use

Employer: Ontario Federation of Indian Friendship Centres

How to Apply:

Please apply for this job only in the manner specified by the employer. Failure to do so may result in your application not being properly considered for the position.

By E-mail: njamieson@ofifc.org
Business Profile: A Non-Profit organization, for the betterment of Urban Aboriginals

Advertised until: 2010/03/21

This job advertisement has been provided by an external employer. Service Canada is not responsible for the accuracy, authenticity or reliability of the content.
post.title: Web developer (NOC: 2175)
